Properties.ProtectedString:
--// Made by StarWars local Debris = game:GetService("Debris") local InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService") local LightningModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(787396013):GetChildren()[1]
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local Character = nil local Player = nil local Humanoid = nil
local CreatorValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorValue.Name = "creator"
local CarScript = Tool.CarScript
function DropCar() Tool.Enabled = false local NewCreator = CreatorValue:Clone() NewCreator.Value = Player local NewModel = LightningModel:Clone() NewCreator.Parent = NewModel NewModel:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(Character.PrimaryPart.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, 10)) local NewScript = CarScript:Clone() NewScript.Parent = NewModel
local CloneHandle = Handle:Clone() CloneHandle.CanCollide = true CloneHandle.CFrame = Handle.CFrame Handle.Transparency = 1 CloneHandle.Parent = workspace Debris:AddItem(CloneHandle, 0.2)
wait(0.2) NewModel.Parent = workspace NewScript.Disabled = false Tool:Destroy() end
function OnActivated() if not Player then return end if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false local NewCreator = CreatorValue:Clone() NewCreator.Value = Player local NewModel = LightningModel:Clone() NewCreator.Parent = NewModel NewModel:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(Character.PrimaryPart.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, 10)) local NewScript = CarScript:Clone() NewScript.Parent = NewModel
local CloneHandle = Handle:Clone() CloneHandle.CanCollide = true CloneHandle.CFrame = Handle.CFrame Handle.Transparency = 1 CloneHandle.Parent = workspace Debris:AddItem(CloneHandle, 0.2)
wait(0.2) NewModel.Parent = workspace NewScript.Disabled = false Tool:Destroy() end
function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
DropCar() end
function OnUnequipped() Character = nil Player = nil Humanoid = nil end
Tool.Activated:Connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(OnUnequipped)

local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local Car = require(script:WaitForChild("Car"))
local Model = script.Parent local Creator = Model:WaitForChild("creator") local Character = Creator.Value.Character local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local NewCar = Car.new(Creator.Value, Model)
while Creator.Value and Character and Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 do local Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") if Torso and Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local Delta = RunService.Heartbeat:wait() NewCar:Update(Delta) else break end end
Model:Destroy()

-- // Made by StarWars
local Car = {} Car.__index = Car
local function WeldModel(model, primaryPart) for i, v in ipairs(model:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then if v ~= primaryPart then local NewWeld = Instance.new("Weld") NewWeld.Name = v.Name NewWeld.Part0 = primaryPart NewWeld.Part1 = v NewWeld.C0 = primaryPart.CFrame:toObjectSpace(v.CFrame) NewWeld.Parent = primaryPart v.Anchored = false end end end
primaryPart.Anchored = false end
function Car.new(owner, model) local self = {}
self.Owner = owner self.Model = model self.Speed = 0 self.WheelRotation = Vector3.new()
WeldModel(self.Model, self.Model.PrimaryPart)
local BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.MaxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyPosition.Position = self.Model.PrimaryPart.Position BodyPosition.Parent = self.Model.PrimaryPart
local Torso = self.Owner:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.D = 500 BodyGyro.P = 1500 BodyGyro.MaxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) if Torso then BodyGyro.CFrame = Torso.CFrame end BodyGyro.Parent = self.Model.PrimaryPart
setmetatable(self, Car) return self end
function Car:Update(delta) local FrontLeftWeld = self.Model.Body:FindFirstChild("Front_LeftWheel") local FrontRightWeld = self.Model.Body:FindFirstChild("Front_RightWheel") local BackLeftWeld = self.Model.Body:FindFirstChild("Back_LeftWheel") local BackRightWeld = self.Model.Body:FindFirstChild("Back_RightWheel") if not FrontLeftWeld or not FrontRightWeld or not BackLeftWeld or not BackRightWeld then return end
local BodyPosition = self.Model.Body:FindFirstChild("BodyPosition") if not BodyPosition then return end
local BodyGyro = self.Model.Body:FindFirstChild("BodyGyro") if not BodyGyro then return end
local Torso = self.Owner.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") local Humanoid = self.Owner.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Torso then return end if not Humanoid then return end
local DownVector = CFrame.new(Torso.Position, Torso.Position - Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)).lookVector local NewRay = Ray.new(Torso.Position, DownVector.Unit * 999)
local Hit, EndPoint = workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(NewRay, {self.Model, self.Owner.Character}) local SizeY = self.Model.PrimaryPart.Size.Y
local OffsetY = Hit and EndPoint.Y + (SizeY * 0.5) or 0
BodyPosition.Position = Torso.CFrame:pointToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, 10)) + Vector3.new(0, OffsetY, 0) - Vector3.new(0, Torso.Position.Y, 0) BodyGyro.CFrame = Torso.CFrame
local Velocity = self.Model.PrimaryPart.Velocity * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)
FrontLeftWeld.C0 = FrontLeftWeld.C0 * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-50) * Velocity.Magnitude * delta, 0, 0) FrontRightWeld.C0 = FrontRightWeld.C0 * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-50) * Velocity.Magnitude * delta, 0, 0) BackLeftWeld.C0 = BackLeftWeld.C0 * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-50) * Velocity.Magnitude * delta, 0, 0) BackRightWeld.C0 = BackRightWeld.C0 * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-50) * Velocity.Magnitude * delta, 0, 0) end
return Car
